entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Freezing rain and a few flurries beginning this morning then changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
